attributes.action: Widen the A1 to 3 lanes through all of Hertfordshire
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
There is currently a bottleneck after the M25 junction at South Mimms and another at Welwyn north.  As this government seems intent on forcing another 10,000 homes in the Hatfied area they simply must impove the road system and add another lane to the A1.

Public transport is too expensive, noisy, dirty and too slow to compete with the car.
